title: Rekkai Katti Parakudhu Lyrics Annamalai
stanzas:
Rekka katti parakkuthadi
annamala cycle.
aasapattu yaerikodi
ayyaavoda bike-il (2)

thola kattipudikaiyile
enna sugam kannammaa
indha sugam edhil irukku
innum konjam povoma

Rekka katti parakkuthaiyaa
annamala cycle.
aasapattu yaerikitten
ayyaavoda bike-il

sarithirame maaripochu
manasu maaralaiye
en cycle-lukkum unakku
mattum vayasu yaeralaiye

kodi panam pugazh irukkudhu
narachcha maapillaiye
innum kozhunthu veththala
madichi kudukkum kurumbu
pogalaiye.

rendu perum meththaiyitu
adi eththana naal aachu
peran pethi kollum vayasula
ennathu veen pechchu

uyir irukkum varai irukkum
idhu kaaman sonna sollaachu.

Rekka katti parakkuthaiyaa
annamala cycle.
aasapattu yaerikitten
ayyaavoda bike-il

aadimanai veeduthaan
santhosam enakku.
nee moonu molam
poo kodutha mundhaana
unakku.

vaalu pochu kaththi
vaththadhu palangathai irukku.
adi vasathi vanthadhu
vazhkai ponathu nammoda kankku.

iruvarukkum oru thalaiyanai
urakkam varaathaa
irukkattum ivanukkum
andha nenappu varaathaa

udal marandhu sugam marandhu
uravaadum neram varaathaa

Rekka katti parakkuthaiyaa
annamala cycle.
aasapattu yaerikodi
ayyaavoda bike-il (2)

thola kattipudikaiyile
enna sugam kannammaa
indha sugam edhil irukku
innum konjam povoma

Rekka katti parakkuthaiyaa
annamala cycle.
aasapattu yaerikodi
ayyaavoda bike-il
